The goal of 'Online Admission System' is to automate the Academic Instituteâ€™s admission structure and its related operation and functionality. The objective of the initiative is to provide support to the administration and admission seeking candidates by providing a faster, transparent and easy way of keeping records and use them for reference and further proceedings.
